column1: Country list with regional grouping and classification (developing and industrialised).
In the manuscript, the discussion is often based on main economies which allows the EU28 to be considered as a single entity.

The EU28 comprises: Austria, Italy, Belgium, Latvia, Bulgaria, Lithuania, Croatia, Luxembourg, Cyprus,  Malta, Czechia, The Netherlands, Denmark, Poland, Estonia, Portugal,Finland, Romania, France, Slovakia, Germany,Slovenia,Greece, Spain,Hungary,Sweden, Ireland and United Kingdom.
